page.title: 10Forty years on cont.
page.content: People who attended went dressed in clothes from the end of the war including several{land girls.}The menus were printed in{ration books. { _Menu-1945 _Menu-1985 Broth with Vegetable soup pearl barley Beef and ham Spam salad Boiled potatoes Creamed potatoes Roly poly Trifle Water biscuits Cheese/biscuits Camp coffee Coffee Cider(farmhouse) Wine {Music}was provided by 'Boysey' Rumsey who was persuaded out of retirement for the occasion.A well known figure locally,he and his assistant played old 78's and accompany them on drums plus other suitable noises made by Mr.Rumsey himself. Research by Sarah Charlton.
